text: The law of the District pertaining to common-law trusts shall supplement this chapter. However, a governing instrument may supersede or modify application to the statutory trust of any law of the District pertaining to common-law trusts.
historical:

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 105 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
